author: Cory Doctorow
description: Today's links AI turns Amazon coders into Amazon warehouse workers: A reverse-centaur in the loop. Hey look at this: Delights to delectate. Object permanence: 2005, 2010, 2015, 2020, 2024 Upcoming appearances: Where to find me. Recent appearances: Where I've been. Latest books: You keep readin' em, I'll keep writin' 'em. Upcoming books: Like I said, I'll keep writin' 'em. Colophon: All the rest. AI turns Amazon coders into Amazon warehouse workers (permalink) On a recent This Machine Kills episode, guest Hagen Blix described the ultimate form of "AI therapy" with a "human in the loop": https://soundcloud.com/thismachinekillspod/405-ai-is-the-demon-god-of-capital-ft-hagen-blix One actual therapist is just having ten chat GPT windows open where they just like have five seconds to interrupt the chatGPT. They have to scan them all and see if it says something really inappropriate. That's your job, to stop it. Blix admits that's not where therapy is at…yet, but he references Laura Pr
title: Pluralistic: AI turns Amazon coders into Amazon warehouse workers (27 May 2025)
